title: Geyser erupts in the Black Sand Basin area of Yellowstone National Park at sunset
description: Geyser erupts in the Black Sand Basin area of Yellowstone National Park at sunset
author: m01229
generated_description: A powerful geyser shoots steam and hot water high into the air during golden hour. The dramatic eruption is silhouetted against a colorful sunset sky with warm orange and pink hues. Dark volcanic terrain surrounds the active thermal feature creating a striking contrast.
